name: Starfighter - The Final War
description:
Starfighter - The Final War is a space combat arcade game where you take on a role of veteran space pilot called back to active duty to save mankind from invading alien force in world war 3. Upgrade spaceship with better lasers or buy a more agile spaceship to fly with.

Features:
- 3 places to explore (Space around planet Earth, Mars and Jupiter)
- 5 different fighter spaceships available to buy
- 3 different rapid fire weapons and 3 different shield piercing weapons
- Missions that provide you with hours of gameplay
- You can control joystick sensibility in Options(Menu)

If you like Starfighter - The Final War, please give it a rate and a review.
